Row.Text: In honour of our brave soldiers, the Australian and New Zealand Army Corps, we commemorate their service to this nation and her allies by signing into law a national holiday marking a day upon which we pay respect to their sacrifices. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be New Zealand. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Modern Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 {1_ResourceDesc}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10 XP for ANZAC units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities with a Military Garrison gain +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness.

In honour of our brave soldiers, the Australian and New Zealand Army Corps, we commemorate their service to this nation and her allies by signing into law a national holiday marking a day upon which we pay respect to their sacrifices. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+10 XP for ANZAC units. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Cities with a Military Garrison gain +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Local Happiness.

It is in our blood to rule; our forefathers were imperialists, and so we should be, too. Let us then establish an imperial realm with which to carve a place of strength for us on the international stage. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be New Zealand. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the Industrial Era. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Units gain a 33% bonus vs cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is equal to the cost of your next Social Policy.[ENDCOLOR]

It is in our blood to rule; our forefathers were imperialists, and so we should be, too. Let us then establish an imperial realm with which to carve a place of strength for us on the international stage.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Naval Units gain a 33% bonus vs cities. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost is equal to the cost of your next Social Policy.[ENDCOLOR]
{1_LeaderDesc} of {2_CivName} has promulgated plans to expand his territory into an empire.

An international committee has recently voted to declare {1_CityName} a world heritage site because of its environmental significance. Such a status will surely bring in many new tourists to visit our country.[NEWLINE]
Excellent. Charge them exorbitant rates to see it!
We have decided to monetize the World Heritage status bestown upon one of our cities.
Wonderful. We must cherish this site for future generations.
We have decided to protect the World Heritage status bestown upon one of our cities.
An international committee has declared the New Zealand city of {1_CityName} to be a World Heritage Site.

The independent paper 'Southern Cross' has reported of the sudden declaration of war between the {2_CivName} and the {1_CivName}. With {3_CivName} a stern ally of ours, the paper has reported that it can only be too long before {4_CivName} seeks an invasion by sea of New Zealand.[NEWLINE]
We must bolster the defense of our coasts!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free {2_UnitName} for each coastal city in the empire[ENDCOLOR]
We have dismissed the claim of an impending naval invasion as a hoax.
This is clearly a hoax. What nonsense.
In light of news of an impending invasion by sea, we have paid to bolster the coastal defenses of New Zealand.
